definitions.definition: Arising as the result of an event, inherent .
examples: No major hazards incident to this job.

definitions.definition: Falling on or striking a surface.
examples: The incident light illuminated the surface.
labels: of a stream of particles or radiation
definitions.label_groups: physics , of a stream of particles or radiation

definitions.definition: Coming or happening accidentally ; not in the usual course of things; not in connection with the main design; not according to expectation; casual ; fortuitous .
Liable to happen; apt to occur; befalling; hence, naturally happening or appertaining .
Dependent upon, or appertaining to, another thing, called the principal .

main_definition: Arising as the result of an event, inherent .
secondary_definitions: ( physics , of a stream of particles or radiation ) Falling on or striking a surface.
Coming or happening accidentally ; not in the usual course of things; not in connection with the main design; not according to expectation; casual ; fortuitous .
Liable to happen; apt to occur; befalling; hence, naturally happening or appertaining .
( law ) Dependent upon, or appertaining to, another thing, called the principal .
( mathematics ) In a relation of incidence
